page.title: 13HAPPY EATER/ GARDEN CENTRE
page.content: {THE HAPPY EATER FAMILY RESTAURANT. It was opened 10 years ago and is the 3rd oldest in England.It is licensed to sell beer and wine.Their busiest days are Sundays when they have 1500 customers.Customers include lorry drivers,reps.,holiday makers and family outings.24 people are employed here but staff are difficult to get because they need their own transport. It serves meals and snacks from 7.30a.m.until 10p.m. {THE HANDCROSS GARDEN CENTRE. } It is situated on the A23.It was built in 1973.It sells plants,trees and shrubs.About 22 people work at the centre.The manager now has worked at the centre for about 2 years. About 100_3000 people come in a day.The busiest day of the week is Sunday.It opens at 9.00am and closes at 6.30pm.
